activities:
First name, last name, email address, logging data elements including items like the # of produce servings, # of steps logged, # of physical activity minutes logged.

Why:  for the health improvement of the individuals who have elected to register for the wellness challenge.

When:  for the length of the campaign defined by the organization (typically between 4 and 12 weeks).
